metadata.name: Kap7 Polo Heads
metadata.description: The world’s first water polo specific NFT project with the goal of bringing passionate water polo fans into one online community. ‘KAP7 Polo Heads’ is a collaboration between KAP7 and well known water polo artist Alex Banerer, with the goal to support water polo projects around the world to access funds and equipment to ensure water polo is continuing to grow worldwide.
